page.title: 12Newburgh Boys' Brigade
page.content: The BB organiasion was founded by William Smith in 1884 in Glasgow. There are 3 stages of BB's in Newburgh The Anchor Boys meet on a Monday from 6_7pm at the Congregational Hall. They usually go on walks, trips and play games in the hall.The Junior section meet in the School hall on Mondays from 6:30_8:00, while the Company section meet on Wednesdays from 7:00_9:00. We enter the marching competitions and in 1985 we came 3rd.We also get P.E. which consists of everything from throwing and catching to gymnastics on the box. Some boys take First Aid which we have every Monday night. In 1985 we came first for the first time. In the Summer 1st, 2nd, 3rd, 4th years all go on a weekend camp There is also a week camp where you can take abseiling, ponytrecking or canoeing.
